about_the_game: The Nyvoss Hex Pack contains the exclusive Hex Paint Kit for Nyvoss manufactured cars. Also includes the Vortex Rims and 5 additional vehicle decals to customise your vehicle.
detailed_description:
WISHLIST MEOW! 😻


About the Game

The Nyvoss Hex Pack contains the exclusive Hex Paint Kit for Nyvoss manufactured cars. Also includes the Vortex Rims and 5 additional vehicle decals to customise your vehicle.
legal_notice: GRIP © 2018 Caged Element Inc. Published by Wired Productions Ltd and developed by Caged Element. GRIP and the GRIP logo are trademarks of Caged Element.  All rights reserved.
name: GRIP: Combat Racing - Nyvoss Hex Pre-Order Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 or Radeon 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970 or Radeon 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is recommended.

short_description: The Nyvoss Hex Pack contains the exclusive Hex Paint Kit for Nyvoss manufactured cars. Also includes the Vortex Rims and 5 additional vehicle decals to customise your vehicle.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
